name: 3D pong (realhardik18)
description:
this is a simple pong game which i made to relearn unity 

its quite simple here are the controls:

a and d to move left and right respectively

p to bring up the pause menu

you can see your score in the top left corner

sometimes the ball will keep on bouncing back and forth between 2 walls, in this case you have to restart the game!

at last, have fun!
